text: Norway will not resume the use of COVID-19 vaccines made by AstraZeneca (AZN.L), while a decision on whether to start using inoculations made by Johnson & Johnson's (JNJ.N) remains on hold, Prime Minister Erna Solberg said on Wednesday.A government-appointed commission had recommended that both vaccines should be excluded from Norway's vaccination programme due to a risk of rare but harmful side-effects.  read more
